TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to search for the added Crash.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the search Crash API - /api/crashdetails/mobile. Verify that already added crash can be searched.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to search the added Crash .
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to search the added Crash.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to search the added Crash.
